Why did %50 of it look like Spanish?
@Toaster PAMA  Because Italian, like Spanish and French, is a romance language. All romance languages derive from Latin.

Also a lot of english speaking native people tend to confuse between this two language (SMH).
We share some root similarities but we are 2 different languages in way of speaking and writing
Like japanese (and unlike english), italian words have the same pronunciation as their writing, what's you see it's what's you should read
